Name: Cocktail for Beauty
About the game: Cocktail for Beauty - This is a classic 3 in a row game. Mix cocktails and treat girls, score points and look at new beauties! Drink them all! Features: Nice graphics Relaxing gameplay Beautiful girls Russian and English voice acting
